name: Clear Horizons
description: Complete the Event Objectives to get Officiant Picard!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

participation_rewards.name: Honor
participation_rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Captain of the legendary U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Captain Picard was key to many of the Federation's successes.

milestones.requirement: Complete 50 Shuttle Missions for the Federation

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D
ship.flavor: A Galaxy-class vessel famously commanded by Captain Picard. Allows for saucer separation in emergency situations.

milestones.requirement: Complete 100 Shuttle Missions for the Federation

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Picard gives a speech at Riker and Troi's wedding, not forgetting to mention how much he will miss the two of them on the ship.

action.name: I Wish You Both Clear Horizons

milestones.requirement: Complete 200 Shuttle Missions for the Federation
Level up Crew from Star Trek: The Next Generation 30 times
Level up Crew from Star Trek: The Next Generation 60 times

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Picard gives a speech at Riker and Troi's wedding, not forgetting to mention how much he will miss the two of them on the ship.

action.name: I Wish You Both Clear Horizons

milestones.requirement: Level up Crew from Star Trek: The Next Generation 90 times
Complete 50 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D
Complete 125 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Picard gives a speech at Riker and Troi's wedding, not forgetting to mention how much he will miss the two of them on the ship.

action.name: I Wish You Both Clear Horizons

milestones.requirement: Complete 250 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D

name: Critical Chroniton Levels!
description: Expend Chronitons in order to receive valuable Crew Retrieval rewards!

rewards.name: Quantum Energy
rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

participation_rewards.name: ISM
participation_rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

name: Prepare for Faction Event
description: Get supplies to power up your crew and bolster your Shuttle Missions

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

participation_rewards.name: Merits
participation_rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 500.
